name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions, proficient in **Ruby**, **TypeScript**, **Rails**, and **React**. Experienced in leveraging cloud technologies like **AWS CDK** and containerization with **Docker** to build and deploy scalable applications. Strong expertise in database management utilizing **Postgres** and **Redis** for optimized data handling and performance. Proven ability to lead the development of applications that integrate AI and ML for enhanced analytics and decision-making. Also skilled in full-stack development with hands-on experience in frameworks such as **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Demonstrates a strong background in building secure and maintainable solutions adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Committed to driving real-world impact with technology and passionate about advancing system efficiency through innovative solutions.
